exercies.heading: Strength Training
exercies.details: In this program, you are trained to improve your strength through many exercises.

exercies.heading: Cardio Training
exercies.details: In this program, you are trained to do sequential moves in range of 20 until 30 minutes.

exercies.heading: Fat Buring
exercies.details: This program is suitable for you who wants to get rid of your fat and lose their weight.

exercies.heading: Healthy Fitness
exercies.details: This programs is designed for those who exercises only for their body fitness not body building.
